metadata.description: Meet Meme, the good-for-nothing daughter of the Demon World's mighty summoner clan. Her dad's kicked her out into the human world to learn some responsibility, and she needs to find a home! Enter Sentarou Narigane, wealthy landlord of Kuroyuri Apartments. Suffering from the worst case of malaise, Sentarou offers Meme a free apartment on one condition: she needs to make him have fun!
metadata.name: The Strange Creature at Kuroyuri Apartments
